title: [solved]820-2850-a , unexpected shut down..... also when playing game
message: Do keep in mind that output on the rail C9560 is on changes based on load, it has the ability to output multiple voltages.

title: [solved]820-2850-a , unexpected shut down..... also when playing game
message: Tantalum caps can go bad, no more science than that....
